data.title: Selected Writings of Salvatore Quasimodo
data.meta_description: Noonday, 1961. First Thus. Trade Paperback. Fair. Item #329071 Covers quite rubbed and creased with a 1/4 tear at top of rear spine seam. Pages very toned, with a dampstain at top corner. A serviceable reading copy of a scarce collection by the Nobel Prize-winning Italian poet.
data.text:
Noonday, 1961. First Thus. Trade Paperback. Fair. Item #329071

Covers quite rubbed and creased with a 1/4 tear at top of rear spine seam. Pages very toned, with a dampstain at top corner. A serviceable reading copy of a scarce collection by the Nobel Prize-winning Italian poet.

Used Book
